name: Super Head Ball (itch)
description:
Super Head Ball is a fast-paced, local multiplayer game for up to 4 couch warriors. Players compete to throw a decapitated head into a blazing pyre while desperately trying to avoid friendly fire. Grab a few controllers and a few friends and fight for the head while trying to keep yours!

Local Multiplayer

Controller support is included for up to 4 players*, but you can also train alone if your friends are wiping the floor with you.

Teamwork

Players on the 2 teams must work together to get the head into the fire, so try not to kill your teammate when they are about to score the winning goal.

*Up to 2 players can play together on one keyboard. 

Player 1: W, A, D, E. 

Player 2: Up, Left, Right, /
